8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

remove-node

Generic function

Summary

Removes a node from a tree control.

Signature

remove-node tree node => ()

Arguments

tree
An instance of <tree-control>.

node
An instance of type <tree-node>.

Values

None

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Removes node from tree.

See also

add-node, page 529

find-node, page 548

make-node, page 612

<tree-control>, page 679

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
